direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods remove elements from the map, but one removes by key and the other by index.
Both methods modify the internal state of the map, affecting the stored elements.
Both methods involve modifying the map's internal structure, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with the map's internal data structure, albeit in different ways (removal vs. addition).
